data.name: EVE Online: 1 Multiple Character Training
data.detailed_description:
Steam Created Accounts Only

This content can only be accessed with EVE Online accounts created through Steam. Existing EVE Online accounts not created through Steam cannot benefit from it.


About the Game

Multiple Character Training (MCT) is a simple way to skill up an alternative character while skipping the hassle of juggling skill queues or accounts.

Activate the MCT token from your redemption queue in-game and start training up to two additional characters at the same time! Try something new on a second character today!

  • Double the Training - Train up to two additional characters without pausing skill training on your main.
  • Do Anything - Train a character into something new. Capital pilot? Market or industry alt? The choice is yours.
  • Convenience Built-In - MCT makes it easy to avoid the hassle of juggling skill queues or accounts.

data.short_description: Train more characters to grow your influence in New Eden! MCT is a simple way to train up to two alternative characters while skipping the hassle of juggling skill queues. Activate an MCT token and reap the benefits of up to two more skill queues!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB Free Space
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection (or faster)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Hard Drive: 23 GB free space
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM
  • Network: ADSL connection or faster
